epic.name: SHRED AND LEAD
epic.description: When you [Wound an enemy, gain 10% Attack Speed for 4s, stacking up to 3 times.

epic.name: BLOODHOUND MASK
epic.description: Gain 5% Weapon Power for each enemy with a [Wound] within 12m.

rare.name: BIGGER MAGNET
rare.description: [Jagged Blade]'s pull strength is increased by 35%.

epic.name: TINKER TRACKSUIT
epic.description: [Rampage] and [Carnage] hits grant 10% Attack Speed for 4s.

epic.name: BOOMING VOICE
epic.description: [Commanding Shout] will affect allies that are out of line of sight.

rare.name: DEZ'S DAMAGE DAMPENERS
rare.description: When knocked back, gain 25% increased Move Speed for 3s.

rare.name: REBELLIOUS SPIRIT
rare.description: When [Wound] gets removed instead of expiring, gain 10% of Max Life as Overhealth, up to 150.

rare.name: SLICING SPREE
rare.description: While within 12m of an enemy with a [Wound], gain 10% Move Speed and 5% Attack Speed.

epic.name: SCAV SCRAPS
epic.description: [Carnage] and [Jagged Blade] impact damage grants Overhealth equal to 40% of damage dealt.

epic.name: UNDYING LOYALTY
epic.description: Allies affected by [Commanding Shout] are healed for 5% of Junker Queen's life every second.

powers.title: THRILL OF BATTLE
powers.description: [Adrenaline Rush] also heals allies within 12m for 50% of the amount it heals you.

powers.title: ROYAL BULLETS
powers.description: [Scattergun] critical hits against targets within 12m applies [Wound] for 30 damage over 3s.

powers.title: TWIST THE KNIFE
powers.description: [Scattergun] critical hits extend the duration of all [Wounds] on the target by 0.5s.

powers.title: BLADE PARADE
powers.description: Holding [Jagged Blade] charges it, increasing its damage by up to 35% and causing it to knockback.

powers.title: CUT 'EM, GRACIE!
powers.description: Each enemy hit by [Jagged Blade] while it returns to you reduces its cooldown by 1s.

powers.title: LET'S GO WIN
powers.description: Eliminations reset the cooldown of [Commanding Shout].

powers.title: MERCILESS MAGNETISM
powers.description: Using [Commanding Shout] causes your [Jagged Blade] to home to a target.

powers.title: RECKONER'S ROAR
powers.description: Using [Commanding Shout] [Wounds] enemies within 10m for 30 damage over 3s.

powers.title: CHOP CHOP
powers.description: [Carnage] gains an additional charge but its cooldown reduction per hit is reduced to 1s.

powers.title: SOARING STONE
powers.description: [Carnage] becomes a leaping strike if you jump during its cast time.

powers.title: BLOODCRAZED
powers.description: [Rampage] and [Carnage] gives 15% of Max Life as Overhealth per hit.

powers.title: BOW DOWN
powers.description: [Rampage] now also knocks down enemies hit for 1.5s.
